question: Group the given figures into three classes using each figure only once.
answer_description: 1, 3, 9 have one element placed inside a different element.2,  5, 6 contain two mutually perpendicular lines dividing the figure into four parts.4,  7, 8 have two similar elements (unequal in size) attached to each other.
